message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset that will bring significant value to your business. My initial offer is $1100000. I'm confident that this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that amount.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to make a deal, but I'm afraid $900000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm counteroffering at $1000000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the value it will bring to you.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not willing to go above $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to be mindful of my budget. I'm counteroffering at $950000. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the value I'll get from the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm counteroffering at $980000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to me and the value it will bring to you.
